title: Hunter
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                      |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The Hunter is a type of fighter who specialises in missile weapons. A Hunter starts with a shortbow, a scroll of butterflies, and a set of leathers. |

## Contents

- [1 Preferred Species](#Preferred_Species)
- [2 Racial Restrictions](#Racial_Restrictions)
- [3 Starting Equipment](#Starting_Equipment)
- [4 Starting Skills and Stats](#Starting_Skills_and_Stats)
- [5 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [6 History](#History)

## Preferred Species

[Hill Orc](/Hill_Orc "Hill Orc"), [Minotaur](/Minotaur "Minotaur"), [Gnoll](/Gnoll "Gnoll"), [Kobold](/Kobold "Kobold"), and [Spriggan](/Spriggan "Spriggan") are the recommended races if you pick a Hunter background.

## Racial Restrictions

[Felids](/Felid "Felid") are forbidden from becoming Hunters, as they cannot use ranged weapons.

## Starting Equipment

Some [species](/Species "Species") may receive different items based on their unique restrictions.

- +0 [shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow")
- +0 [leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour")
- [Scroll of butterflies](/Scroll_of_butterflies "Scroll of butterflies")

## Starting Skills and Stats

These are adjusted by your species' [aptitudes](/Aptitude "Aptitude").

- [Fighting](/Fighting "Fighting"): 2
- [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons"): 4
- [Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging"): 2
- [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth"): 1

Choosing Hunter adds 3 to your starting [Strength](/Strength "Strength"), 1 to your starting [Intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence") and 8 to your starting [Dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity").

## Strategy

Hunter is your archetypical ranged combat background. Shortbows are a strong earlygame weapon, essentially a [trident](/Trident "Trident") with 7 tiles of reach instead of 2. Fast species, namely [Spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan"), can continuously retreat and [kite](/Kiting "Kiting") with the bow.

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), Hunters started with a [scroll of immolation](/Scroll_of_immolation "Scroll of immolation") instead of butterflies.

- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") were reworked. Prior to this version:

  - Hunters started with a choice of [hunting sling](/Hunting_sling "Hunting sling"), [hand crossbow](/Hand_crossbow "Hand crossbow"), shortbow, or [throwing](/Throwing "Throwing") weapons. Launchers were +1 and started with 20 of their respective ammo. Throwing started with 6 [javelins](/Javelin "Javelin") (adjusted for species) and 2 [throwing nets](/Throwing_net "Throwing net").
  - Hunters had 4 strength / 3 intelligence / 5 dexterity.
  - Hunters started with a [short blade](/Short_blade "Short blade").
  - This version gave almost all backgrounds a consumable: hunters now start with a [scroll of immolation](/Scroll_of_immolation "Scroll of immolation").

- Prior to [0.24](/0.24 "0.24"), small hunters started with [tomahawks](/Tomahawk "Tomahawk") instead of boomerangs.

- Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), Hunters that chose javelins started with only 5 and did not have throwing nets.

- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), Hunters started with 20 [gold](/Gold "Gold").

| [Backgrounds](/Background "Background") |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| --------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Warriors                                | [Fighter](/Fighter "Fighter") • [Gladiator](/Gladiator "Gladiator") • [Monk](/Monk "Monk") • [Hunter]() • [Brigand](/Brigand "Brigand")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Zealots                                 | [Berserker](/Berserker "Berserker") • [Chaos Knight](/Chaos_Knight "Chaos Knight") • [Cinder Acolyte](/Cinder_Acolyte "Cinder Acolyte")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Warrior-mages                           | [Warper](/Warper "Warper") • [Hexslinger](/Hexslinger "Hexslinger") • [Enchanter](/Enchanter "Enchanter") • [Reaver](/Reaver "Reaver")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| Mages                                   | [Hedge Wizard](/Hedge_Wizard "Hedge Wizard") • [Conjurer](/Conjurer "Conjurer") • [Summoner](/Summoner "Summoner") • [Necromancer](/Necromancer "Necromancer") • [Fire Elementalist](/Fire_Elementalist "Fire Elementalist") • [Ice Elementalist](/Ice_Elementalist "Ice Elementalist") • [Air Elementalist](/Air_Elementalist "Air Elementalist") • [Earth Elementalist](/Earth_Elementalist "Earth Elementalist") • [Alchemist](/Alchemist "Alchemist") |
| Adventurers                             | [Artificer](/Artificer "Artificer") • [Shapeshifter](/Shapeshifter "Shapeshifter") • [Wanderer](/Wanderer "Wanderer") • [Delver](/Delver "Delver")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
html:
Hunter

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The Hunter is a type of fighter who specialises in missile weapons. A Hunter starts with a shortbow, a scroll of butterflies, and a set of leathers.

Contents

  • 1 Preferred Species
  • 2 Racial Restrictions
  • 3 Starting Equipment
  • 4 Starting Skills and Stats
  • 5 Strategy
  • 6 History

Preferred Species

Hill Orc, Minotaur, Gnoll, Kobold, and Spriggan are the recommended races if you pick a Hunter background.

Racial Restrictions

Felids are forbidden from becoming Hunters, as they cannot use ranged weapons.

Starting Equipment

Some species may receive different items based on their unique restrictions.

  • +0 shortbow
  • +0 leather armour
  • Scroll of butterflies

Starting Skills and Stats

These are adjusted by your species' aptitudes.

  • Fighting: 2
  • Ranged Weapons: 4
  • Dodging: 2
  • Stealth: 1

Choosing Hunter adds 3 to your starting Strength, 1 to your starting Intelligence and 8 to your starting Dexterity.

Strategy

Hunter is your archetypical ranged combat background. Shortbows are a strong earlygame weapon, essentially a trident with 7 tiles of reach instead of 2. Fast species, namely Spriggans, can continuously retreat and kite with the bow.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, Hunters started with a scroll of immolation instead of butterflies.
  • In 0.29, Ranged Weapons were reworked. Prior to this version:
    • Hunters started with a choice of hunting sling, hand crossbow, shortbow, or throwing weapons. Launchers were +1 and started with 20 of their respective ammo. Throwing started with 6 javelins (adjusted for species) and 2 throwing nets.
    • Hunters had 4 strength / 3 intelligence / 5 dexterity.
    • Hunters started with a short blade.
    • This version gave almost all backgrounds a consumable: hunters now start with a scroll of immolation.
  • Prior to 0.24, small hunters started with tomahawks instead of boomerangs.
  • Prior to 0.15, Hunters that chose javelins started with only 5 and did not have throwing nets.
  • Prior to 0.14, Hunters started with 20 gold.
Backgrounds
Warriors Fighter • Gladiator • Monk • Hunter • Brigand
Zealots Berserker • Chaos Knight • Cinder Acolyte
Warrior-mages Warper • Hexslinger • Enchanter • Reaver
Mages Hedge Wizard • Conjurer • Summoner • Necromancer • Fire Elementalist • Ice Elementalist • Air Elementalist • Earth Elementalist • Alchemist
Adventurers Artificer • Shapeshifter • Wanderer • Delver

{{flavour|The Hunter is a type of fighter who specialises in missile weapons. A Hunter starts with a shortbow, a scroll of butterflies, and a set of leathers.}}

==Preferred Species==
[[Hill Orc]], [[Minotaur]], [[Gnoll]], [[Kobold]], and [[Spriggan]] are the recommended races if you pick a Hunter background.

==Racial Restrictions==
[[Felid]]s are forbidden from becoming Hunters, as they cannot use ranged weapons.

==Starting Equipment==
Some [[species]] may receive different items based on their unique restrictions.
*+0 [[shortbow]]
*+0 [[leather armour]]
*[[Scroll of butterflies]]

==Starting Skills and Stats==
These are adjusted by your species' [[aptitude]]s.

*[[Fighting]]: 2
*[[Ranged Weapons]]: 4
*[[Dodging]]: 2
*[[Stealth]]: 1

Choosing Hunter adds 3 to your starting [[Strength]], 1 to your starting [[Intelligence]] and 8 to your starting [[Dexterity]].

==Strategy==
Hunter is your archetypical ranged combat background. Shortbows are a strong earlygame weapon, essentially a [[trident]] with 7 tiles of reach instead of 2. Fast species, namely [[Spriggan]]s, can continuously retreat and [[kiting|kite]] with the bow.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], Hunters started with a [[scroll of immolation]] instead of butterflies.
*In [[0.29]], [[Ranged Weapons]] were reworked. Prior to this version:
**Hunters started with a choice of [[hunting sling]], [[hand crossbow]], shortbow, or [[throwing]] weapons. Launchers were +1 and started with 20 of their respective ammo. Throwing started with 6 [[javelin]]s (adjusted for species) and 2 [[throwing net]]s.
**Hunters had 4 strength / 3 intelligence / 5 dexterity.
**Hunters started with a [[short blade]].
**This version gave almost all backgrounds a consumable: hunters now start with a [[scroll of immolation]].
*Prior to [[0.24]], small hunters started with [[tomahawk]]s instead of boomerangs.
*Prior to [[0.15]], Hunters that chose javelins started with only 5 and did not have throwing nets.
*Prior to [[0.14]], Hunters started with 20 [[gold]].
